actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require the Consumer Product Safety Commission to promulgate standards applicable to plastic bags and sheeting with dangerous adhesive characteristics, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Consumer Product Safety Commission to promulgate standards applicable to plastic bags and other commercial articles utilizing plastic sheeting with dangerous adhesive characteristics.

titles.title: A bill to require the Consumer Product Safety Commission to promulgate standards applicable to plastic bags and sheeting with dangerous adhesive characteristics, and for other purposes.
